updated_cases.title: Inaccurate categorization: Different categories for same domain across events
updated_cases.custom_summary: One event shows category as 'Business Process Management' but two other events categorize this as 'Parked Domains'.Â  Under 'URL Lookup, for netskope.loopio.com, the only category displayed is Business Process Management. Based on this, the 'Parked Domains' categorization looks inaccurate.
updated_cases.custom_preconds: URL Filtering should enabled in the tenant
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. We should see always one category for the domain

updated_cases.title: Verify whether default bypass domains get synced to proxy for cloud tenant
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify whether default bypass domains get synced to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected: Default domains should not get synced to proxy

updated_cases.title: Verify whether default bypass domains get synced to proxy for Altos tenant
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify whether default bypass domains get synced to proxy for Altos tenant
updated_cases.custom_expected: Default domains should synced to proxy

updated_cases.title: Verify whether HttpAuth Service  sends proper url information to the  URLLOOKup service when  we send the traffic from native app with custom port mentioned
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify whether HttpAuth Service  sends proper url information to the  URLLOOKup service when  we send the traffic from native app with custom port mentioned
updated_cases.custom_steps: Send the traffic to the proxy from the native app
updated_cases.custom_expected: Httpauth layer should send proper url information to the urllookup module

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Validate all the variables are displayed properly on client notification when template is created with all the available variables for message field on Linux platform
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name, User, 
Instance ID, Object Name, Source IP (Real Time Policy), Destination IP (Real Time Policy), Groups, OU, POP, From User, From User, Time, Malware Name, Application Session ID, Transaction ID, HTTP Referer, URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme, URL.

Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy for upload for Box application.

Perform Upload to Box application from Windows
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure Application, Categories, FQDN, Activity, Policy Name, User, 
Instance ID, Object Name, Source IP (Real Time Policy), Destination IP (Real Time Policy), Groups, OU, POP, From User, From User, Time, Malware Name, Application Session ID, Transaction ID, HTTP Referer, URI Query, URI Path, URI Port, URI Scheme and URL are displayed properly in message and subtitle field are displayed properly in client notification.

updated_cases.title: [Client notification] Validate old template along with new template.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
Disable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.

Create user justification template with existing variables - NS_APP, NS_CATEGORY, NS_URL, NS_HOST, NS_POLICY_NAME â†’ UJ template1

Enable enable_notification_new_template_variables feature flag.
Create user justification template with existing variables with new name: Application, Categories, FQDN and Activity in message and subtitle field


Change usernotification setting to client.

Create user alert policy with upload for Box application with template1

Create user alert policy with upload for WeTransfer application with template2

Perform Upload to Box application.

Perform Upload to WeTransfer application.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Make sure template1 is displayed for Box application Upload.

Make sure template2 is displayed for Box application Upload.
